column5: Kincardine Chantry Chinook Derby a couple of fish weighed in, The Kids fishing off the Pier for Kids Day over 60 kids & a Band playing at the Harbour, lots going on, scales are open 11:00-2:00 & 7:00 - 10:00pm, Fish Fry Aug 11-12 from 4:00-8:00pm & Derby ends Sunday Aug 12-12 noon Tight Lines SBK  Chantry Derby & Kids Day Video
